name: Moving Forward (blumerang, takashi-san)
description:
In this short yet captivating experience, you have to guide a little girl through the city streets so she can find her lost cat. 

The project was made in less than a week for the Weekly Game Jam 147, whose theme was "Invisible". Although the jam is over, we deeply appreciate comments and feedback so we can improve and update the game. We hope you can enjoy it! :) Feel free to contact us.
